html:
7.21.20  1:18 am   Who is your inspiration in your animation?

      everyone but also everything and every place

7.21.20  12:59 am   Let's imagine in the future there was a machine that could accurately emulate the sounds and images in ones own mind in real time and display them on a monitor. Would this be the ideal way for you to create all of the endless amount of ideas you have?

      yes

7.21.20  12:53 am   What is the universe?

      could be you

7.21.20  12:38 am   What are your thoughts on the effectiveness of the language of love.

      almost too effective. use with care

7.20.20  11:57 pm   How long have you been making songs?

      since the flood

7.20.20  11:45 pm   Have you ever wanted to cut open your own computer, to see if there's cake or sumn in there?

      no

7.20.20  11:23 pm   So are you working on finding a method of consistantly make videos,

     yes

      or are you working on learning the technical parts of it like software?

     at this point i am teaching the software to do stuff

7.20.20  11:06 pm   Isn't 'prehistoric' a weird term?

     yes

     
'Pre' meaning before and 'historic' referring to history.
So 'before history' makes no sense. The fact that things happened in 'prehistoric' times means that it was part of history. Wouldn't history start when time start?

     yes

7.20.20  11:00 pm   Opinions on banana bread?

      never heard of it

7.20.20  10:44 pm   how do I get better in music?

      that's going to happen whether you like it or not

7.20.20  10:25 pm   how much progress have you made with the project you're doing

      a lot

7.20.20  9:52 pm   what is your opinion on the north pole 

      i can never seem to find it

7.20.20  9:31 pm   Do you find yourself walking to a steady bpm on long walks?

      it doesn't matter how long the walk is, walking tempo will always be quite steady. this is probably normal

7.20.20  9:15 pm   will you ever appear on Hot Ones?

      maybe if we could do it without the wings

7.20.20  8:44 pm   hey bill, i am starting a blog, and i am really excited about it and wrote a few posts in one day. i don't have very much content on there and i am eager to fill it with stuff, but also i don't want to run out of content too quickly and then not upload anything for a long time. should i stick to a schedule of uploading, or put it all out there now. oh and by the way no one is reading it right now.

      do a writing session each time before you post something. not necessarily for the thing you are posting that day, just add new writing each time you post something new, to keep the ball moving forward. usually my problem is the opposite problem where i write 10000x more than it would ever be possible to produce

7.20.20  8:42 pm   what do you think is hiding behind the "scenes"

      a lot of problems and, fortunately, problem solving

7.20.20  8:41 pm   at the airport terminal are the planes landing?

      not very much

7.20.20  8:35 pm   What inspired you to make 'It's Gonna Be Alright' (April 23, 2014)?

      i had recorded 5 or 6 songs already on that new weekly schedule, and i thought i was ready. was probably afraid to do that one before because it felt like one of the more impotant ones, which had been around for a long time..... scared to screw it up

7.20.20  8:29 pm   Hey bill. Mind telling me what ya woking on? Maybe giv a hint? I'd appreciate it.

     i'm inventing ways and systems for doing what i do best

7.20.20  7:52 pm   my hat is bent. should i slow down?

      if anything you should speed up, then the hat should straighten out

7.20.20  7:29 pm   How do you come up with your chords? They always have some cool musical thing going on and I think they sound great.

      the whole trick is to come up with the lyrics, chords, and melody all at the exact same time. that's the only way any of it works

7.20.20  6:28 pm   Can you tell me how to music?

      start by hitting things, to find the most interesting to hit. if none of them are interesting you will have to hit them in an interesting pattern to there by force it to be interesting

7.20.20  6:11 pm   you want to invent a way to create movies without having to depend on a large team of people and a large amount of money?

      OH THAT SOUNDS DELICIOUS

7.20.20  6:09 pm   What is the name of your big project

      bill wurtz

7.20.20  6:07 pm   The sky is so big. It's too big, in fact. Do you ever worry it will try to kill us? 

      no

7.20.20  5:29 pm   are you ironic

      let me perform some tests

7.20.20  5:15 pm   What are your deep thoughts on the number 3

      besides 1 and 2, it is the most significant number of life. And, in case you can't decide between 1 and 2, 3 instantly becomes the number 1 choice

7.20.20  4:58 pm   thoughts on the name henry?

      short for henjamin

7.20.20  3:37 pm   have you considered uploading your vine videos to your website? the html video tag supports the "loop" attribute, which would be great for displaying them how they were on vine

      that's not true. i have yet to discover any method that actually loops them in time, which would be necessary for the musical loops such as q train, have a good day, etc. And any adjustment made to the video to get it to be in proper timing would have to cut off a huge chunk

7.20.20  3:28 pm   why are musical notes written in letters of the alphabet

      to help you understand

7.20.20  3:07 pm   How reasonable are you on average 

      i broke the scale so it's hard to tell

7.20.20  3:05 pm   are inchworms cool?

      maybe if you haven't discovered footworms

7.20.20  2:10 pm   Why Times New Roman? DO the serifs in the font make you feel some sort of ~way~ ?

     i rarely use it but yes

      Sans serif fonts can be nice too...

     that's true, you may have noticed the majority of the fonts i use are sans serif

7.20.20  1:32 pm   Opinions on snakes

      can't tell where one snake ends and the next one begins

7.20.20  1:14 pm   why do they call it an oven when you of in the cold food of out hot eat the food?

      it's part of the 'of in' board game marketing campaign

7.20.20  1:03 pm   why are monkeys so silly? 

      silliness is contagious. they must have caught it from the rest of the universe

7.20.20  12:58 pm   do you know any unatural phenomenon ?

      i was going to say yes but now that i think about it no

7.20.20  12:48 pm   Do you ever answer with lies/sarcasm?

      that's preposterous. who do you think i am

7.20.20  12:44 pm   what are your views on fridges

      too hot

7.20.20  12:39 pm   Thoughts on global warming?

      some say it's just a phase, others say it is a timeless classic

7.20.20  12:21 pm   what state of matter best describes you

      regular

7.20.20  12:14 pm   in your opinion, who is the greatest artist/ musical act of all time?

      could be you

7.20.20  11:57 am   do you ever just wish you could have all different types of content come out all at once

      oh dear yes

7.20.20  11:11 am   I'm making my first video over summer. Do you have any tips?

      don't be alarmed if it ends up mysteriously 'not happening'. if that happens, you can probably still get your revenge next spring by deliberately doing videos so simple it's IMPOSSIBLE not to do them. and that WILL work

7.20.20  11:04 am   Hello mr.bill, what are your thoughts on uncooked potatos

      they are extremely valuable, that's because the potato cooking process is very difficult to reverse

7.20.20  10:53 am   how do i make bread?

      i suddenly just realized i don't know, and i am not pleased to realize this. not knowing how to make bread is a sign of terrible weakness

7.20.20  9:53 am   what do u think is the most ideal type of person

      could be you

7.20.20  8:42 am   when will you retire?

      maybe some other time

7.20.20  6:47 am   Thoughts on hamsters?

      not all hamsters are actors, and not all actors are hamsters; but, some hamsters are actors, and in turn, some actors are hamsters

7.20.20  6:35 am   What's your favourite music video that you've made?

      i would prefer to make 1000 new ones to be my favorite
